TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerOptionService

summary.span: 提供对设计器选项的访问；在 Visual Studio 开发环境中，设计器选项位于“选项”命令下的“工具”菜单上\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*。

span.span: Provides access to the designer options located on the **Tools** menu under the **Options** command in the Visual Studio development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一个接口，该接口可用于检索和更新 Windows 窗体设计器选项的值，这些选项列在 Visual Studio 开发环境的 "**工具**" 菜单的 "**选项**" 命令所显示的对话框中。 provides an interface that can be used to retrieve and update the values of the Windows Forms Designer options, which are listed within the dialog displayed by the **Options** command of the **Tools** menu of the Visual Studio development environment. 方法检索指定选项的值。The method retrieves the value of a specified option. 方法为指定选项设置指定的值。The method sets a specified value for a specified option. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 以显示标准选项的当前值。The following code example demonstrates accessing the to display the current values of the standard options. [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetOptionValue (string pageName, string valueName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetOptionValue(string pageName, string valueName) cil managed
Public Function GetOptionValue (pageName As String, valueName As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetOptionValue(System::String ^ pageName, System::String ^ valueName);
abstract member GetOptionValue : string * string -> obj

param.name: pageName
param.span: 定义该选项的页的名称。

span.span: The name of the page that defines the option.
The name of the option property.

summary.span: 获取指定的 Windows 窗体设计器选项的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the specified Windows Forms Designer option.
The value of the specified option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pageName`参数应包含 "WindowsFormsDesigner \\ *CategoryName*类名"，其中*类别*名称是不含任何空白字符的选项类别名称。The `pageName` parameter should consist of "WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*", where *CategoryName* is an options category name without any white space characters. 类别名称通常为 "常规"。The category name is typically "General". 因此，你可以使用英语页面名称 "WindowsFormsDesigner\General" 访问 "常规" 设计器选项类别。Therefore, you can access the "General" designer options category with the English page name "WindowsFormsDesigner\General". > [!NOTE] > 页面和值名称始终应为英语。The page and value names are always expected in English. 因此，提供了下表来帮助您访问所需的选项。Therefore, the following table is provided to help you access the options you want. 下表指明了英语值名称、它们的数据格式以及每个值的说明：The following table indicates the English value names, their data format, and a description of each: |值名称Value Name|值格式Value Format|说明Description| |----------------|------------------|-----------------| |GridSizeGridSize||每个网格正方形的大小。The size of each grid square.| |GridSizeGridSize.Width||每个网格正方形的宽度。The width of each grid square. 当通过设计器选项服务访问时，此嵌套属性是只读的。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |GridSizeGridSize.Height||每个网格正方形的高度。The height of each grid square. 当通过设计器选项服务访问时，此嵌套属性是只读的。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |ShowGridShowGrid||`true` 如果应显示网格，则为; 否则为。 `false` 如果不应显示网格，则为。`true` if the grid should be shown; `false` if the grid should not be shown.| |SnapToGridSnapToGrid||`true` 如果组件的位置应与网格对齐，则为; 否则为。 `false` 如果不一定要对齐位置，则为。`true` if the positions of the components should be aligned to the grid; `false` if the positions should not necessarily be aligned.| |LayoutModeLayoutMode|`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Windows.Forms.LayoutMode`|`SnapLines` 若要使用对齐线或将 `SnapToGrid` 控件与网格对齐，`SnapLines` to use snaplines, or `SnapToGrid` to align controls to the grid,| |ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShowObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow||如果允许组件的智能标记面板在创建时自动打开，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`.| |AutoToolboxPopulateAutoToolboxPopulate||`true` 自动将解决方案的自定义控件和组件添加到 **工具箱**;否则为 `false` 。`true` to automatically add a solution's custom controls and components to the **Toolbox**; otherwise, `false`.| |UseOptimizedCodeGenerationUseOptimizedCodeGeneration||如果启用组件缓存，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来查询选项的值 `GridSize` 。The following code example demonstrates using the method to query for the value of the `GridSize` option. [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetOptionValue (string pageName, string valueName, object value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetOptionValue(string pageName, string valueName, object value) cil managed
Public Sub SetOptionValue (pageName As String, valueName As String, value As Object)
public: void SetOptionValue(System::String ^ pageName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ value);
abstract member SetOptionValue : string * string * obj -> unit

param.name: pageName
param.span: 定义该选项的页的名称。

span.span: The name of the page that defines the option.
The name of the option property.

summary.span: 设置指定的 Windows 窗体设计器选项的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the specified Windows Forms Designer option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pageName`参数应包含 "WindowsFormsDesigner \\ *CategoryName*类名"，其中*类别*名称是不含任何空白字符的选项类别名称。The `pageName` parameter should consist of "WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*", where *CategoryName* is an options category name without any white space characters. 类别名称通常为 "常规"。The category name is typically "General". 因此，你可以使用英语页面名称 "WindowsFormsDesigner\General" 访问 "常规" 设计器选项类别。Therefore, you can access the "General" designer options category with the English page name "WindowsFormsDesigner\General". > [!NOTE] > 页面和值名称始终应为英语。The page and value names are always expected in English. 因此，提供了下表来帮助您访问所需的选项。Therefore, the following table is provided to help you access the options you want. 下表指明了英语值名称、它们的数据格式以及每个值的说明：The following table indicates the English value names, their data format, and a description of each: |值名称Value Name|值格式Value Format|说明Description| |----------------|------------------|-----------------| |GridSizeGridSize||每个网格正方形的大小。The size of each grid square.| |GridSizeGridSize.Width||每个网格正方形的宽度。The width of each grid square. 当通过设计器选项服务访问时，此嵌套属性是只读的。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |GridSizeGridSize.Height||每个网格正方形的高度。The height of each grid square. 当通过设计器选项服务访问时，此嵌套属性是只读的。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |ShowGridShowGrid||`true` 如果应显示网格，则为; 否则为。 `false` 如果不应显示网格，则为。`true` if the grid should be shown; `false` if the grid should not be shown.| |SnapToGridSnapToGrid||`true` 如果组件的位置应与网格对齐，则为; 否则为。 `false` 如果不一定要对齐位置，则为。`true` if the positions of the components should be aligned to the grid; `false` if the positions should not necessarily be aligned.| |LayoutModeLayoutMode|`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Windows.Forms.LayoutMode`|`SnapLines` 若要使用对齐线或将 `SnapToGrid` 控件与网格对齐，`SnapLines` to use snaplines, or `SnapToGrid` to align controls to the grid,| |ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShowObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow||如果允许组件的智能标记面板在创建时自动打开，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`.| |AutoToolboxPopulateAutoToolboxPopulate||`true` 自动将解决方案的自定义控件和组件添加到 **工具箱**;否则为 `false` 。`true` to automatically add a solution's custom controls and components to the **Toolbox**; otherwise, `false`.| |UseOptimizedCodeGenerationUseOptimizedCodeGeneration||如果启用组件缓存，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`.|
